Amsterdam


We moved to Amsterdam on four weeks notice in September 2016. We were stuck in temporary (terrible) accommodation for a while, before I scooped up a gorgeous townhouse flat right in the city on a quiet canal.

Amsterdam is a perfect city to wander round and enjoy. The culture is very different to Britain - so is the weather!
